1.content:
in the viking tribes theres a tradition to abandon weak children but when cheif stoic came to power he thought that it was a waste because though he was dim he was bright enough to know that he was dim and so was the rest of the tribe and the reason that threats like the romans were so dangerous was because it was easy for them to out think the vikings but he devised a scheme so that he would still be obeying the tribes former rules.

the idea was that any ill formed or genraly weak infants from their tribe or any other that they found floating in the tide (as most viking parents put the ill children in floating objects and cast them out to sea) and the would live on an unnamed volcano just off the shore of birks main land so they would not actualy be living on birk so not breaking the traditions, this also meant that because nothing grows on the volcano they would depend on the tribe for food as they were intended to be essentialy slaves and they would be steralised so that they could not weaken the blood of the tribe, also to make it clear that they were less than the real birkens they were not alowed to wear color or sleep on beds.

these all seemed like good decisions as the weaklings named the volcano pyrovillia meaning house of fire, they sleapt in the caves and made contraptions and weapons for the mainlanders and all was going well until hiccup was born.

hiccup was stoics only son and he was born small and underweight which meant that he had to live with the others but stoic fealt sorry for his son and proclaimed that yes he would live on pyrovilia as tradition demanded but he would be the cheif of the pyrovilians as a way of moraly conpensating.
1.title: only the strong could belong

choices: Chron's perspective (Hiccup's soon to be teacher)
Rell's perspective (unofficial leader of the pyrovillias)
11.content:
when Hiccup was given to the Pyrovillians to be their chief it was like a miracle, at last they thought, someone to represent us, we can finally get some rights.
It was true that the Pyrovillians were not allowed coloured clothes, sleeping in beds, to grow their own food or to live on the mainland of Berk but the worst part was the constant bullying and disrespect of the Vikings, some days they were beaten half to death but this child would change that.
But in order to do that he must survive and as he was newborn he needed milk but the no Pyrovillian was yet older than twelve so that was something that they could not provide until a girl only ten years old took the precious infant in her arms and slowly cut a vein in her own wrist and as the blood flowed she put her wrist to the infants mouth and allowed him to suckle on for what he thought was milk, after all it was warm and nutritious and that was all that was needed to keep him fed.
but now who's perspective should the story be read?
11.title: next day

13.content: hiccup had spent the first five years of his life only being taught the basic technologies that the pyrovillias currently knew such as compasses and maps, from age five to ten he was still being tutored but was making sophisticated clocks and made many designs, shortly after his tenth birthday he exceeded any former technological knowledge of the pyrovillians and one day chief stoic came to the mountain (and there was an awkward stare between him and hiccup) and he spoke to all the five pyrovillians "now that your new cheif has shown some potential you will work together in a new commision, we will provide materials of wood, stone and some steal and you must on a large scale around the village improve:
13.title: hiccup is 10

security was not the same as defence, defence would be fighting of dragons or other Vikings when they attacked, security was to know immidiatly when they were under attack as Berk was able to fight of hoards of dragons but often not before they got their claws on the sheep so being able to detect the dragons before they could do any real damage.

immidiatly hiccups head was swarmed with ideas but what to start with?

14.content: 17 years later hiccup has matured into a moody teenager and a true genious with machines, he had an arteficial leg due to loosing one in an accident in making a clockwork chainsaw (which realy worked) but it was more than a chunk of wood and iron, it was an elegant steal talon with hundreds of tiny brass cogs working to interpret any twitch into a leg movment and actualy worked better than his right leg, he wore black as the rules demanded but he included a pair of brass gogles which focused on the cockwork workings of his machines, he had a pair of leater gloves which he had fitted with magnets so that anything metal would levitate in his hands, he could also use them to stop arrows and swords anddirect throwing knifes and tools which was more for impressing the idiod villagers on the mainland much like his crown which he had made so that there was a single floating, rotating cog apearing magicaly above the rest of his crown throughwhich his bright red hair could be clearly seen, he also had a tool belt full of tools whith which the tool tip was suspended to the handel magneticly to that he could fix things from the inside, he holds a clockwork chain saw as a sword and a magnetic sheild for defence, he wore lots of light weight, skintight iron plate armour which was unnoticable under his black tshirt, trousers, boots(with knifes sticking out) and a big black cloak which was open chested, had a hood and covered his arms and reached his ancles like a cape, this cloak was made of dragon skin so it was fireproof to.
14.title: hiccup is 17

141.content:
many people lived with him on pyrovillia but of all them a small handful formed his elite mechanics.

fishlegs whose new name was pendulat floated to birk in a lobster pot and was a dragon expert exelent at pyrotechnics he brewed gunpowder for cannons and his weapon of choice was a five kilo hammer at the end of a long staff with a spear head on the other end as well as a plethora of grenades each of which had the same affect of certain dragon fires, he had armour surgicly inserted under his skin with iron spikes sticking through the skin in his sholders and head to that even if was stabed in what apeared to be mortal flesh the blade would stop and bend making him like all the others seem imortal. he created airstreds fire suit and wings as well as helicopter gunships and hot air baloons, he wore a black shirt so that his skull tatoos on his arms could be clearly seen and black trousers and boots.

ruffcog used capes with optical ilusions which could be used as distractions in battle including one which was so effective that it made things apear as though there were six of them, he used a prear but it was yet to taste blood as he is more of a distraction for tuffcog., he designed tanks and ground vehicles, he also wore a helmet with a viser which had a clocking device on the ear so that he could count the ticks and time his enemies in how fast they fought and moved.

tuffcog was the twin sister of ruffcog she used opposite optical ilusions to apear invisable she used a pelethora of throwing knifes as well as a staff which would magneticly curve the path of the knifes she also glided on roller skates, she designed the organisation of the cave systems in pyrovilia and made camoflage, she was also a great cook and a natural mother to the younger ones

airstrid was hiccups girlfriend and she had clockwork wings which let her fly like a dragon and she used a gun that fired shuricans and lightning, she also wore black dragonskin which she would often set on fire in battle to prove that she could not be burned, she wore a black cape which her wings blended into, her fire suit, a helmet made out of a wolf skull, sholderpads and a studded skirt, she helpd build the steam engines that turned the volcanos destructive heat and turned it into the constructive force of the spring cells and the master core which was a massive spring cell that powered the whole place

volteer was hiccups champion he used two chainswords which arced lightning and he had spinning cog blades magneticly spining around his sholders and wrists and he had a pet wolf which he had augmented so that it did not eat or drink but it instead needed to be wound up because it was clockwork he also created airsteds gun the bolt slinger and he was very involved in making the defences of pyrovillia.

all of the mechanics above worked with hiccup made a force of twenty arteficial clockwork soldiers which dwarfed the vikings, they saw these soldiers called the machine kind as their children as they would never have any real children

the rest of the pyrovilians were fairly similar, they wore black clocks and other cloths, wore plate armour and used complex tools and weapons, they also had lots of tatoos and scars and occasionaly an arteficial limb, they were all thiner than the villagers but most were taller than the villagers and they had a better muscel to fat ratio.

142.content: pyrovillia is more than the simple volcano it was when they moved in, they added huge steam engines to power the base, in an adjacent cave there is a massive version of a spring cell which powered the base and other spring cells, this chamber is the center of a spiderweb of chambers including the sleeping quarters, the meditating caves, the throne room and the great hall
142.title: explain the base

choices: go to the arena to fight
go to the arena to watch
143.content:
hiccup was the name his father gave him but he name himself kaldr which was the norse word for cold as he was said to have a cold heart, he liked to sleep during the day and work in the night but now he had made a pelethora of unsold devices so he loaded up a cart with guns and such but not even half full beause he knew that he would get much more meat that he would need to carry back, it was a friday which meant that the vikings were trading before the weakend so he walked the well troden path over the bridge between the volcano and the island and got to the viking village, anyone could have stolen his goods of of that cart but obody dared as a regular pyrovillian was tall, thin, black, made a resinate ticking noise and was genraly scary enough as it was but hiccup looked like he was magic because of the way he could move metal without touching it so most people were scared of him.

but that didnt stop the trading, he managed to sell everything he had brought but of course the best tech was kept at the base so the stuff he was selling was fairly trivial.

they did not discover electrizity yet though the pyrovilians did make vandagraph generators but most energy in the village was traded in the form of spring cells, basicly tightly wound springs with a bolt on the end and a cover so as not to get your fingers trapt. the smallest variety was about the size of a can of coke, it wa used to run cheap clockwork assult rifles which fired small pebbles as bullets, they were very cheap but could easily kill dear and occasionaly dragons and almost evryone had one even the infants but they were simple and weak compared to his weapons, the largest spring cells were the ize of water tanks, the village had sevral for its new heavy defences such as the steam cannon, the steam cannons were of his design but it took all the pyrovilians to get the damn things working, the idea was that they had a wood burning fire at the base of the turret that boiled vast quantities of waster and the steam was pumped into a chamber behind a massive iron bullet and when the pressure was high enough it would launch the bullet at ten thousatnd miles an hour, these things would tear through a sea dragonous giganticus maximus but the village used gunpowder cannons on smaller targets. the spring cells could be sold, used, bought back for a fraction of the price and refilled.

he had also made a new arm for gobber (free of charge because gobber was a friend) as well as a clockwork blender, five chainswords and replacment parts for the weather predicting machine, he had filled his cart with the meat, bread, mead and even cake as payment but then he saw a sign on the village news board "5 gold pices for anyone who can beat snotlout in the arena"
143.title: explain his creations

choices: go and have fun scaring the villagers with friends
1433.content:
hiccup looked around his throne room, he was cleaning his weapons when he realised that he needed more anti steam
anti steam was liquid air, they made it by compressing air and then cooling it, they used it in their weapons to fire steal darts at super sonic spead, and they rarley sold it to the vikings not because it was rare or hard to make but because that pushed up its price and the vikings were willing to pay beause anything with anti steam in it was ten times better than without simply because the mechs wouldnt waste the stuff on anything cheap. they called it anti steam because they knew that the air like substance made from boiling water was called steam so logicaly the water like substance made from cooling air should be anti steam, it was first discovered by sub zero, a young mechanic with gloves that sprayed liquid air to either freeze water to walk on it or freeze his enimies before smashing them with a hammer and his hair had been burned of y freezer burn so the vikings nicknamed him lauphi the god of winter, up until the discovery he was only known for making a refrigerating device used to cool down food, make ice, and vent pryrotechnics, since the discovery he became a lot more respected

pyrot was sub zero's older brother and was mainly known for making flame throwers and was very intrested in ionising flame colors, for example he could make flames that were green or blue or red or yellow or even purple.
hiccup like any other of the mechs was augmented in lots of small ways, bones, teeth, hair, all basic stuff but the realy unique thing about him was that for a lot of his childhood, his greatest creation was a divice that was both a clock and a compas and a GPS "essentialy, it gave latitude and longitude" and a lie detector and a thermometer and a radio comunicater as well as many other functions, but one day when they were young hiccup, pendulat and volteer were going hunting for fun as they were good friends but some idiot villager shot hiccup in the chest thinking that he was a dear, giccups heart was mashed and he was technicaly dead but the cold weather slowed the dying process slowly, in an atempt to save him pendulat wired hiccups device currently know simply as the ticking thing into his blood vessels and volteer started it up with a shock and he survived but to this day he has a clockwork heart but he has augmented himself further so that he could use the devices other functions just by thinking so
he could tell time to the milisecond and know the tempreture to the degree, know if people are lying, know navigation perfectly and phycicly comunicated with machines, not to mention the villagers are freaked out by the fact that he died and is now back to life with these powers and a cold clockwork heart.
1433.title: go home

144.content:
well... put simply... they don't

it is five years after the war should have ended but hiccup never found toothless and so an alliance was never met, the vikings have made many attempts at the nest and have been getting much more effective at it due to the new weapons and navigation equipment and were frequently coming back alive but the vikings being a greater threat had not scared the dragons away as they had a permanent nest and they still needed the extra food so they simply sent more aggressive spices of dragons to raid the now more aggressive vikings such as the thunder drums, the driver dragons and the devilish dervishes and so the vikings simply had the mechanics build stronger defenses and weapons and so the war only escalated as the mechanics developed better food supplies which made the rewards of raiding all the higher.

one day you are in pyrovillias master forge (as pyrovillia had developed into quite the fortress) putting together a ventilation mechanism for the mines when a brass bell rings above your head indicating that someone is at the front gate and you look through one of the quick visors which were basically telescopes working with mirrors so that people in pyrovillia can check whats happening in other rooms and this one was pointed at the front gate where you saw stoic the vast, whilst you weren't to fond of your biological father you knew that this meant good business, you go to the gate to meet stoic and he explains that he wants your help in

15.content: when hiccup was very young he only made small simple things like guns and watches but as he grew so did his mind and capabilities and he and his compatriots expanded into other sciences such as psychology and particle physics and then non sciences like politics, strategies, theology and they became less dependant on the birkens until when he was 20 he and his compatriots had the ability to live without any use of the birkens and had the means to destroy them but decided that it would be an unnessisary waste of human life, a few years later they calculated that they could use the birkens resources ten times more efficiently but still decided to live peacefully as a sign of good will but when hiccup was 28 chief stoic died and snotlout came to power who immidiatly started taking away the pyrovilians rights and sold them to other tribes as even worse off slaves, it was at this point where hiccup decided to put an end to this, now two years later him and his companions had created a sophisticated robot army 10, 000 strong and were hiding them in a cavern, also he had replaced more than half of his own parts so if every human cell in his body died of age or plague he could live on as a machine, because of this he fancied himself as an immortal god-like creature who much preferred the cyborg pyrovillias to the fleshy birkens, he was quite a sight to, his natural hair had been replaced by long thin silver wires, his mouth and nose was covered by an iron visor and his eyes were replaced by disturbing cylindrical cameras that were the wrong shape for his skull and stuck out weirdly, the rest of his body was clad in black and silver armour which he had made himself, he had life support tech all over him not because he was ill but because he was forcing an overdrive, he could lift ten times his own weight and leap over mountains because he was burning up his mortal flesh at an alarming rate.
15.title: hiccup is 30
